summary:
My second mod, I have spent hours to modify and test, the MOD is a W.I.P .
There will be future updates.
descriptionHtml:
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;    _____       D A Y W A L K E R    _____       V A M P I R E    _____       ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
For now I have \"refined\" all vampire powers found on the player human form vampire.
A work in progress to increase Vampire + Vampire Lord form powers. However, it is decided that in Vampire Lord form, the player will have the weakness to sunlight and fire. For now this is the update I have decided to upload. It is a better version of my first mod, Vampire Mod.

------------------------------------
Dawnguard Required
------------------------------------
author: MonkeyD2013
